source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000010_ALPHINAUD<tab>The dawn's light will shine again...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000010_ALPHINAUD<tab>「暁」に、再び明かりを灯す……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>So long as we have these specious accusations hanging over us, we will struggle to achieve anything.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000020_ALPHINAUDそのためにも、最初の一歩を踏み出さねばならないが……
あらぬ疑いをかけられたままでは、できることも少ない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000030_ALPHINAUD<tab>You must go to Ishgard, as Tataru proposed. I will return to Ul'dah and set things right.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000030_ALPHINAUDイシュガルドの地で再起をという、
タタルの言葉にも一理あるとは思う。
君とタタルだけでも彼の地に赴き、私はウルダハに戻って……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000040_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Pray do not be so hasty, Master Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000040_HAURCHEFANT<tab>焦りは禁物ですぞ、アルフィノ殿。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lord Haurchefant?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>オルシュファン殿……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000060_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Full well do I understand your desire to clear your names.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000060_HAURCHEFANTウルダハの動乱の真意を解明し、
身の潔白を明らかにしたいのは理解できます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000070_HAURCHEFANT<tab>But now is not the time for drastic action. You yet have allies upon whom you can rely. There is no need to act alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000070_HAURCHEFANTしかし、このような苦境にあればこそ、
焦りは禁物というもの。
……それに貴方には、頼もしい仲間がおられるでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yes...yes, of course. Pray forgive my impatience.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000080_ALPHINAUDそうでしたね……。
私はもう、ひとりではないんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000090_HAURCHEFANT<tab>I bring tidings. Count Edmont has decreed that the three of you be taken in as wards of House Fortemps. Under our patronage, you shall be granted access to the city proper.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000090_HAURCHEFANT朗報を持ってきましたぞ。
我がフォルタン家当主、エドモン・ド・フォルタン伯爵が、
お三方の後見人となることを、申し出てくださりましてな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000100_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Pray consider our manor your new headquarters, from which you may gather information and plan how best to proceed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000100_HAURCHEFANTこれにより、お三方は、イシュガルド四大名家のひとつ……
「フォルタン家」の庇護下に置かれた正式な客人として、
皇都に入ることが可能となりました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000110_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Needless to say, should any of your missing allies be found─as I am certain they shall─they will of course be welcome to join you there.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000110_HAURCHEFANTまずは、本家の屋敷を拠点に、情報を集めながら、
今後の方針を固めるといいでしょう。
反撃の狼煙を上げるのは、それからでも遅くはありません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000120_ALPHINAUD<tab>You are more than generous, my friend. On behalf of my fellows, I humbly accept your offer of hospitality.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000120_ALPHINAUD……わかりました。
では、ご厚意に甘えさせていただきます。
感謝いたします、オルシュファン殿。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000130_HAURCHEFANT<tab>The count is a good man and just. He will treat you with the kindness and respect that a hero─and dear friend─deserves.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000130_HAURCHEFANT当主は、アイメリク総長と同様に、話のわかるお方だ。
きっと、お前にもイイ対応をしてくださるだろう。
……後ほど会おうぞ、友よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000140_ALPHINAUD<tab>To Ishgard, then─together.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000140_ALPHINAUD行こう……。
千年の戦を続ける正教の都、皇都「イシュガルド」へ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000150_ALPHINAUD<tab>There we shall carry on the Scions' legacy. There we shall begin anew.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000150_ALPHINAUD「暁」の想いを無にしないために……
私たちの戦いを、もう一度、始めるために。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000160_TATARU<tab>Hear, hear!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_000160_TATARU<tab>はいでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_100010_EDMONT<tab>And so they came, at a friend's behest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_100010_EDMONT<tab>その者は わずかな友を伴い やって来た

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_100020_EDMONTHeroes once celebrated as saviors of Eorzea, brought low through treachery,
their names blackened with royal blood...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_100020_EDMONT陰謀により 血で穢された祝賀会を脱した かつての英雄は
あらぬ汚名を着せられ 今や追われる身である

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_100030_EDMONTWith memories of the lost and dreams of redemption,
with hope yet in their hearts, they came...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_100030_EDMONTそれでもなお　再起を信じ
失われた仲間と希望を捜し求め 彼らは歩み続けていた

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200010_EDMONT<tab>To Ishgard, shining city on the mount, overlooking the dominion of Coerthas...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200010_EDMONT堕ちた英雄が訪れたのは
北方の地クルザスを領する 山の都「イシュガルド」

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200020_EDMONTA great and proud nation devoted to Halone, the Fury, ruled by Thordan VII,
Archbishop of the Ishgardian Orthodox Church...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200020_EDMONT国教「イシュガルド正教」の長たる教皇が王権を有し
戦神ハルオーネを主神とする 宗教都市国家である

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200030_EDMONTThe last bastion of the Faith, her walls ever bristling with
the sworn swords and spears of her four High Houses...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200030_EDMONT四大名家率いる貴族たちが 剣と槍を掲げ
仇敵ドラゴン族から 都市を護り 戦い続ける

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200040_EDMONTA land that after a thousand years of war
had forgotten what it was to be at peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200040_EDMONT<tab>「竜詩戦争」とも呼ばれる 千年もの果て無き戦いを――

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200050_EDMONTThrough gates long closed the Warrior of Light and companions passed,
entering at last a city whose history was written in blood.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200050_EDMONT固く閉ざされた大審門の扉を開き
歴史ある皇都に足を踏み入れた 光の戦士たち

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200060_EDMONTIn the midst of the Dragonsong War they came─three weary travelers
whose arrival would set in motion great change...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200060_EDMONT彼ら異邦の者たちの到来が
千年の歴史を揺るがす 変革の始まりとなることを

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200070_EDMONT<tab>Though none knew then how great...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200070_EDMONT<tab>この時 知る者はいなかった

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200080_NARRATIONFrom the memoirs of Count Edmont de Fortemps
Heavensward
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_200080_NARRATION――エドモン・ド・フォルタン伯爵の回顧録
『蒼天のイシュガルド』より

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300010_HAURCHEFANT<tab>My lord, I have returned with the Scions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300010_HAURCHEFANTオルシュファン。
ただ今、「暁」の皆さまをお連れいたしました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300020_EDMONT<tab>I hope your journey was not too taxing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300020_EDMONTおぉ、到着したか。
よくぞおいでになった、「暁」の方々よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300030_EDMONT<tab>I, Count Edmont de Fortemps, do bid you welcome.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300030_EDMONT我が名は、エドモン・ド・フォルタン。
お初にお目に掛かる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300040_EDMONT<tab>As wards of House Fortemps, you shall be afforded every courtesy. My home is your home.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300040_EDMONT歴史ある「フォルタン家」の家名を継ぐ者として、
一同、皆さまの来訪を、心より歓迎しますぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300050_ALPHINAUD<tab>My companions and I are deeply honored, Count Fortemps.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300050_ALPHINAUDお会いできて光栄です、閣下。
この度のお招き、誠にありがとうございます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300060_EDMONT<tab>The honor is mine, Master Alphinaud. Consider it an expression of our gratitude for your service to Ishgard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300060_EDMONT礼をせねばならぬのは、こちらの方というもの。
イシュガルドの民を代表し、感謝の意を示させてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Forgive me, my lord, but...are you not concerned? To accept foreign guests at such a juncture─especially ones with our...reputation...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300070_ALPHINAUDしかし、外様の……しかも、汚名を着せられた我々を、
客として迎え入れることに、問題はないのでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300080_EDMONT<tab>Do not worry yourself on my account. 'Tis true that Ishgard's first thought has ever been the war effort, hence the closing of our borders...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300080_EDMONTアルフィノ殿は、心配性でいらっしゃる。
確かに、我らが皇都「イシュガルド」は、
ドラゴン族との戦いに専念すべく、門戸を閉ざしてきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300090_EDMONT<tab>...Yet it is in troubled times most of all that men should seek allies, don't you think?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300090_EDMONTだが私は、こうした難局にあればこそ、
国外の勢力と手を取り合うべきだと考えている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300100_EDMONT<tab>Granted, my decision will have raised eyebrows in the Vault and in the halls of the other High Houses.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300100_EDMONT……むろん、教皇庁の内部や、ほかの四大名家の中には、
貴殿らの訪問に、眉をひそめる者もおりましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300110_EDMONT<tab>But so long as you continue with your altruistic endeavors, I doubt my honored peers will feel moved to voice their concerns.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300110_EDMONTなればこそ、エオルゼアの救済のために活動する、
貴殿らの行動によって、誤解を解いてもらいたいのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then there is naught to fear. Though our numbers are much reduced, we are no less determined to carry on our work.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300120_ALPHINAUD伯爵閣下のお言葉を聞き、安心しました。
仲間が散り散りになった今、できることはかぎられましょうが、
閣下の想いに応えられるよう、務めさせていただきます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300130_EDMONT<tab>Full glad am I to hear it. Ah, but before you return to your labors, why not take a tour of the city?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300130_EDMONTそれはありがたい。
そうですな……まずは、皇都の暮らしに慣れるためにも、
都市内を見回ってきてはいかがかな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300140_EDMONT<tab>You would do well, I think, to acquaint yourselves with your new surroundings. After all, you may be here for some time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_300140_EDMONTイシュガルドで何を成すべきかを考えるのは、
その後でもよろしかろう。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_400010_EDMONTTo the frozen wastes of the western highlands,
once verdant tracts made pallid by the Calamity...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_400010_EDMONT第七霊災による気候変動は
クルザス西部高地を 極寒の世界へと変えた

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_400020_EDMONTBeyond the towering wall of ice, to lands long forsaken
that the knights of Ishgard strove tirelessly to reclaim...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_400020_EDMONT氷壁に道を閉ざされ 一時は放棄されたこの地を
再びイシュガルドの民が 取り戻そうとしている

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_400030_EDMONTTo the hamlet of Falcon's Nest, once abandoned,
now freed of its pall of snow and ash, came...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_400030_EDMONT冒険者が降り立ったのは
正に再建の途上にある寒村「ファルコンネスト」だった

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500010_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Looking for me, I presume.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500010_ICEHEART<tab>この私を、狩りに来たというのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Ahhh, the child who glimpsed the truth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500020_MIDGARDSORMR久しいな、真実の片鱗を知る娘よ……。
汝が「黙約の塔」を訪れたとき以来か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500030_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)No, it cannot be!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500030_ICEHEART<tab>……ま、まさか、あなたは！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> cameth unto me, as didst thou.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>左様……我こそは、始祖たる幻龍。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500050_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Alike in gifts, yet set upon different paths.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500050_MIDGARDSORMR汝らは、同じ力を持ちながらも、
ずいぶんと異なる道を歩んできたようだな。
……やはり、ヒトとは不可思議な種よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500060_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)He speaks true, Warrior of Light. Like you, I have been blessed with the Echo.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500060_ICEHEARTそのとおりだ、光の戦士よ……。
私は、あなたと同じ「超える力」を持つ者。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500070_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)The visions terrified me at first. They came without warning. I wondered what I had done to deserve them...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500070_ICEHEART最初は、幻のように現れる過去の情景を前にして、
その意味すらわからず、怯えさえした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500080_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)But I had no time to ponder such things once the Calamity came.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500080_ICEHEARTしかし、5年前にすべてが変わった。
……そう「第七霊災」が起きたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500090_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)The land turned against us, and in a matter of hours, Falcon's Nest was buried under ten fulms of ice and snow. We had no choice but to flee for Ishgard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500090_ICEHEART霊災によりクルザスの環境は激変……。
私の故郷「ファルコンネスト」は、
瞬く間に、雪と氷に閉ざされてしまった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500100_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)We came to the wall, and while we searched for a way through, there was an avalanche. And then I was alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500100_ICEHEART多くの住民とともに、イシュガルドに避難しようとしたが、
眼前で、大氷壁の一部が崩落……
家族を失った私は、引き返さざるを得なかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500110_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)So I set forth for Dravania. I knew full well what might happen were I found, but I could not survive on my own.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500110_ICEHEART寒さに追い立てられ、ドラゴン族に襲われる危険を承知で、
西方のドラヴァニアへと逃れたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500120_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)I was found, of course─and not by a mere dragon, but by the great wyrm Hraesvelgr!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500120_ICEHEARTそして、かの地で私は出会った。
偉大なる「七大天竜」の一翼、聖竜「フレースヴェルグ」に。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500130_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)And it was then that I knew why I had been given this gift, for with it I heard his voice, and saw the truth through his eyes!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500130_ICEHEARTそして、視たのだ……
竜詩戦争の「真実」を！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500140_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)I was chosen to deliver this revelation to the people─to bring dragon and man together, as they once were, and should ever be!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500140_ICEHEARTだからこそ私は、種の融和のため、
この地に満ちた欺瞞と戦っている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_Q1_000_000<tab>イゼルに何という？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A1_000_001<tab>Killing civilians won't bring them together!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A1_000_001<tab>そのために罪なき人を殺すのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A1_000_002<tab>What of the innocents who died when you attacked Foundation?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A1_000_002<tab>皇都襲撃で民に大きな被害が出た

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500150_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)It wasn't supposed to be like that! You have to believe me! It was...beyond my control...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500150_ICEHEARTわかっている、わかっているのだ……！
イシュガルドの民がドラゴン族を憎むのは、
彼ら自身に非がないことくらい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500160_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Children taught to fear the skies, who saw their loved ones slaughtered...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500160_ICEHEART生まれ落ちたときから、竜を忌むべき存在と教えられ、
目の前で肉親を殺されもすれば、戦うも道理というもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500170_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)Yet the Dravanians─though they know where the fault truly lies─fell upon them with such fury...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500170_ICEHEARTだが、ドラゴン族も、また理性的ではいられず、
真の敵を知ってなお、人そのものを憎んでいる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500180_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Men die, and their children forget. But we are everlasting. To us, then is as now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500180_MIDGARDSORMR命短きヒトの子には、歴史に埋もれた記録であろうとも、
悠久の時を生きる竜には、忘れがたき記憶よな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500190_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Thou canst not comprehend the violation. The outrage. The fury.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500190_MIDGARDSORMRその怒りの深さと狂気は、
ヒトの子たる汝らに、計り知れるものではない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500200_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)I will make this right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500200_ICEHEART<tab>……犯した罪は、償うつもりだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500210_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)I am neither a saint nor a savior─just another sinner. Yet I will not forsake this cause. I cannot. I will see this cycle broken and peace restored.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500210_ICEHEART私は、聖女でも救い主でもない罪人だ……。
それでも、決して諦めはしない。
因果を根本から断ち切り、融和をもたらしてみせる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500220_ICEHEART<tab>(-Iceheart-)I... We can do naught else, for we are now as one...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_500220_ICEHEART私はすでに、私自身であるだけではなく、
竜を愛した「シヴァ」でもあるのだから……。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_600010_EDMONTUpon an airship conceived within the fecund mind of Cid Garlond,
renegade prodigy of Garlemald who had come to call Eorzea home...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_600010_EDMONTガレマール帝国出身の天才機工師
シドがもたらした飛空艇技術は 人々を空へと誘った

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_600020_EDMONTHigh into the heavens where isles of earth and stone floated as clouds─
a frontier the knights of Ishgard had scarce begun to explore...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_600020_EDMONT仰ぎ見ることすら難しかった 雲海の「浮島」にさえ
今やイシュガルドの騎兵たちが 降り立ち活動している

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_600030_EDMONTTo a fledgling outpost within the Sea of Clouds where careworn scouts
ever scanned the skies for winged shadows, came...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_600030_EDMONT天よりドラゴン族の動きを見張るための監視所が
アバラシア雲海に築かれつつあったのである

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700010_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Reinforcements!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700010_HAURCHEFANT<tab>くっ、また増援か！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700020_HONU<tab>Anger of Honu, chief of mighty Vundu, roils like blackest storm clouds!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700020_HONUバヌバヌ治める偉大なブンドの長、このホヌバヌは、
沸き立つ雲のように怒りに満ちている！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700030_HONU<tab>Offer netherlings to the White! Cloud sea swells and He comes!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700030_HONUホヌバヌを怒らせる、地の底を歩く者たちは、
泡立つ雲の神に捧げなければならない～！
……来たりませ、白き神！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700040_HONU<tab>The White! The White! Mighty Bismarck, Lord of the Mists!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700040_HONUおぉぉ、白き神！　白き神！
大いなる雲神「ビスマルク」……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700050_HAURCHEFANT<tab>A flying whale!? By the Fury, i-it's a primal!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700050_HAURCHEFANTなっ、雲神……だと？
新たなる蛮神だというのか！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700060_HAURCHEFANT<tab>We must away!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700060_HAURCHEFANT<tab>……確かに、ここは逃げるが勝ちか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700070_HAURCHEFANT<tab>Damn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700070_HAURCHEFANT<tab>くっ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700080_CID<tab>Bloody typical... All right─we're going in!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700080_CIDまったく、何がどうなってやがるんだ！？
ええい、突っ込むぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700090_BIGGSWEDGE<tab>(-Biggs and Wedge-)Aye aye, chief!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700090_BIGGSWEDGE<tab>(-ビッグスとウェッジ-)りょ、りょうかい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700100_CID<tab>All aboard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_700100_CID<tab>急げ、離脱する！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800010_EDMONT<tab>The hero returns! I cannot thank you enough for saving young Emmanellain's life. Aye, aye─he told me everything.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800010_EDMONT戻られたか、冒険者殿！
貴殿の活躍については、息子たちから聞き及んでおるぞ。
次男のエマネランにいたっては、命を救われたとか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800020_EDMONT<tab>I've also received letters from both House Dzemael and Durendaire praising your conduct─and that of House Fortemps. You've won us much honor, my friend.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800020_EDMONT内心はともあれ、ゼーメル家やデュランデル家から、
感謝状が届いているほどでな、私も後見人として鼻が高い。
まさしく貴殿は、我らフォルタン家の友といえよう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800030_HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARD<tab>My lord!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800030_HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARD<tab>しっ、失礼いたします！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800040_EDMONT<tab>What is it? Speak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800040_EDMONT<tab>無礼であろう、何事か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800050_HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARD<tab>Pray forgive the intrusion, my lord, but I-I bring grave tidings!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800050_HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARD申し訳ございません……。
ですが、急ぎご報告しなければならない、
緊急事態が発生したのでございます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800060_HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARD<tab>Master Alphinaud and Mistress Tataru have been detained on suspicion of fomenting heresy!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800060_HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARD我らが客人、アルフィノ様とタタル様が、
異端疑惑により、連行されてしまわれたのです！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800070_EDMONT<tab>What? Explain!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800070_EDMONTなんだと……！？
く、詳しく説明せい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800080_HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARD<tab>They...they were observed entering a tavern in the lower levels on some half-dozen occasions. There, it is claimed, they made a number of inquiries...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800080_HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARDハッ……。
ご両人は、平民向けの酒場に出入りし、
情報収集をされていたご様子。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800090_HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARD<tab>Inquiries which brought them into contact with certain...ahem...elements. 'Twas this which prompted a knight of the Heavens' Ward to demand that they be questioned. Ser Grinnaux, my lord...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800090_HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARDその際、下賤な者たちと接触されたようで……
それを知った「蒼天騎士」のグリノー卿が、
異端審問局に告発されたのでございます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800100_EDMONT<tab>Ser Grinnaux is a brute─an exceedingly accomplished brute, but a brute nonetheless. Alas, he is also a son of House Dzemael.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800100_EDMONTグリノー卿とは、ゼーメル家の血を引く者……。
知性の欠片もないが、武術だけは一流という無骨者だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800110_EDMONT<tab>How quickly we forget the petty nature of men. I'd wager your friends are no more than pawns in another of my countrymen's games. Such is the way of things between the High Houses...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_800110_EDMONT危機がのど元を過ぎれば、足の引っ張り合いを始める……。
どうやら、イシュガルド貴族社会の悪しき伝統に、
貴殿らを巻き込んでしまったようだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900010_TRIALOFFICIANT<tab>We are gathered here today, under the watchful gaze of the Fury, to ascertain the guilt of two souls in a trial by combat! Petitioners, step forward!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900010_TRIALOFFICIANTこれより、被告人の申し立てにより、
戦神「ハルオーネ」の御前におきて、決闘裁判を執り行う！
……告発人前へ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900020_TRIALOFFICIANT<tab>Ser Grinnaux─for the benefit of all here present, I would ask you to repeat the charges which you have leveled against this man and this woman.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900020_TRIALOFFICIANT蒼天騎士グリノー卿……
汝、この者らを告発するか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900030_GRINNAUX<tab>I, Ser Grinnaux de Dzemael, brother of the Heavens' Ward, did bear witness to these two foreigners consorting with heretics!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900030_GRINNAUX我が名は、グリノー・ド・ゼーメル！
蒼天騎士の名誉にかけて、そこなる異邦人二名を、
異端者との密通容疑により告発するものである！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900040_TRIALOFFICIANT<tab>Let the accused step forward!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900040_TRIALOFFICIANT<tab>被告人前へ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900050_TRIALOFFICIANT<tab>Alphinaud Leveilleur, Tataru Taru─you have heard the charges leveled against you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900050_TRIALOFFICIANT異邦人アルフィノ・ルヴェユール……
および、異邦人タタル・タル。
汝らに改めて問う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900060_TRIALOFFICIANT<tab>Will you take up arms to refute Ser Grinnaux's claim and thereby prove your innocence in the eyes of gods and men?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900060_TRIALOFFICIANTグリノー卿による告発に対し、
身の潔白を訴え、決闘裁判を求めるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900070_ALPHINAUD<tab>I, Alphinaud Leveilleur, am innocent of this charge, and claim my right to trial by combat!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900070_ALPHINAUD我が名は、アルフィノ・ルヴェユール。
そうだ、我々は無実であり、告発されるいわれはない……！
正当な権利として、決闘裁判を要求する！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900080_TATARU<tab>I, Tataru Taru, am innocent of this charge...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900080_TATARU<tab>わわわ、私は、タタル・タルでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900090_TATARU<tab>But I am no warrior, and cannot fight, so I claim the right to name a champion!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900090_TATARUこ、このとおり、か弱き乙女なのでっす……
戦うのは無理なので、だだだ、代理闘士を求めるでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900100_TRIALOFFICIANT<tab>To the old and the infirm, the young and the weak, this right we allow. Very well. Who will stand for this woman?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900100_TRIALOFFICIANT確かに、幼児や老人、そして女性など、
戦う術を持たぬ者には、代理闘士の選出が認められている。
……被告人の擁護者として、決闘場に立つ者は誰ぞ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Just as I was beginning to doubt the efficacy of the Ishgardian justice system! Come, my friend─let us put an end to this mummer's farce!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900110_ALPHINAUD来てくれたのか、ありがとう！
なんとしても、無実を証明してみせるぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900120_TRIALOFFICIANT<tab>O Halone, render unto us Your judgment! Raise up the righteous, and cast down the wicked!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_900120_TRIALOFFICIANT戦神「ハルオーネ」よ、ご照覧あれ！
そして願わくば、真実を明らかにしたまえ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00010_AYMERIC<tab>Your Eminence, it is my honor to present to you the Warrior of Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00010_AYMERIC教皇猊下……
光の戦士殿がいらっしゃいました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00020_THORDAN<tab>I have heard the tales of your many grand endeavors. The lord commander has also been most effusive in his praise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00020_THORDAN貴公の噂は耳にしておるぞ、英雄殿。
神殿騎士団のアイメリク卿からも、その評判を聞いていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00030_THORDAN<tab>I am Thordan VII, Archbishop of the Ishgardian Orthodox Church, and I bade you come here that I might offer my personal apologies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00030_THORDANわしは、トールダン7世……
イシュガルド正教を束ねる教皇の立場にある者よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00040_THORDAN<tab>You will forgive me for not calling upon you as courtesy would dictate, but as you can see, my more spritely days are long behind me. But I digress.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00040_THORDANどうしても貴公に、一言詫びねばと思うてな。
しかし、見てのとおりの老骨では、思うようにもいかず、
無礼と知りつつ、貴公に足を運んでもらったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00050_THORDAN<tab>Your companions were wrongly accused of heresy and subjected to gross indignities. This, I am sorry to say, was the result of negligence on the part of our nation's protectors─negligence born of an excess of zeal. Is that not so, Ser Zephirin?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00050_THORDANそれというのも、貴公の友人が異端告発された件よ。
どうやら些細な行き違いがあったらしいの……
そうであろう、ゼフィラン卿？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00060_ZEPHIRIN<tab>Yes, Your Eminence... Regrettably, it would appear that we of the Heavens' Ward were in receipt of erroneous information.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00060_ZEPHIRINハッ……。
恥ずかしながら、我ら蒼天騎士団に寄せられた情報が、
誤っていたようです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00070_ZEPHIRIN<tab>Ser Grinnaux has ever been headstrong. He pressed charges before the truth had been ascertained, for which I most sincerely apologize.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00070_ZEPHIRIN我が部下、グリノー卿の独断であったとはいえ、
無実の罪で告発したこと、申し訳なく思っている。
このとおりだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00080_THORDAN<tab>An unfortunate misunderstanding born of an earnest desire to serve Ishgard─but one which should never have occurred...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00080_THORDAN貴公らが、イシュガルドの為に成してくれた事を思えば、
かような「行き違い」など、起きようはずもないのにのう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00090_THORDAN<tab>For who could doubt the character of those who bested Shiva and drove the Horde from the Steps of Faith? Not I, that much is certain.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00090_THORDAN蛮神「シヴァ」や、皇都防衛戦での働き……
改めて礼をさせてほしい。
ほかの者にも、貴公らを厚く遇するように申しておこう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00100_THORDAN<tab>That will be all, Ser Zephirin. I would speak with our guest in private.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00100_THORDANさて……ゼフィラン卿。
人払いを願えるかの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00110_ZEPHIRIN<tab>Your Eminence? I─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00110_ZEPHIRIN<tab>し、しかし、猊下……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00120_ZEPHIRIN<tab>As you wish, Your Eminence. That will be all for today!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00120_ZEPHIRINかしこまりました……。
人払いを！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00130_THORDAN<tab>Privacy is a luxury rarely afforded one in my position.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00130_THORDANふむ、教皇などという立場になると、
若者と面と向かって話すだけでも、一苦労よ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00140_THORDAN<tab>Now, tell me, young <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((man)) /var>: what do you know of the Ascians?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00140_THORDANところで、英雄殿。
……貴公は、「アシエン」なる者をご存知かな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00150_THORDAN<tab>Much and more, I shouldn't wonder, being the Bringer of Light. You should know that I myself have met with them─have entertained them as guests, even.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00150_THORDAN貴公を「光の使徒」たる者と見込んで話す。
……この教皇庁も、奴らからの接触を受けておるのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00160_THORDAN<tab>Those harbingers of chaos and strife offered us power, that we might continue our war against the dragons.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00160_THORDANアシエン……奴らは、混沌の種をまいて回る存在よ。
ドラゴン族との戦争を続ける我らに、
力をあたえると言ってきおった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00170_THORDAN<tab>I have no intention of aiding their cause, of course, nor less of being their puppet.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00170_THORDANむろん、わしは、奴らに与するつもりも、
その思惑どおりに踊ってやるつもりも、ありはせん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00180_THORDAN<tab>Yet were I to refuse them outright, I should learn naught of their true objectives and remain powerless to stop them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00180_THORDANしかし、連中の企みに対抗しようにも、
その真なる目的を知らずしては何もできぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00190_THORDAN<tab>Thus have I hearkened to their words with interest, and paid lip service to their beliefs, biding my time and preparing for the inevitable conflict.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00190_THORDAN故に、話を聞く素振りを見せつつ、様子を覗ってきたのだ。
……いずれ訪れる、奴らとの対決に備えての。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00200_THORDAN<tab>And why do I tell you this? Because there is naught in this world they fear more than the power of the Warrior of Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00200_THORDANなぜなのかは、わからぬが……
奴らは、光の戦士と呼ばれておる貴公の力を、
ことのほか警戒しているようでな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00210_THORDAN<tab>If we are to rid ourselves of these vile interlopers, we must needs work together. With our combined strength, I have faith that we can wrest Eorzea from their grasp, and pave the way for a lasting peace. Think on it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_A00210_THORDANだからこそ、わしとしても、貴公と協力できるのであれば、
手を取り合っていきたいと思っておるのだ。
エオルゼアの真なる平和のためにも……な。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00010_ALPHINAUD<tab>There you are. I confess, I was more than a little concerned when I learned that you had been summoned to the Vault. What did they want with you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00010_ALPHINAUDあぁ、戻ったか。
君が教皇庁に呼び出されたと聞いて、
何があったのかと心配していたところだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well, well. A formal apology and an admonishment of those responsible? I see my fears were wholly misplaced.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00020_ALPHINAUDなるほど……。
我々に対する謝罪と、貴族への牽制。
そして、自身の関与を否定してきたか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00030_ALPHINAUD<tab>By the gods, the archbishop freely admits to consorting with Ascians? So their ambitions extend to Ishgard as well...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00030_ALPHINAUDなっ、なに……！？
教皇自身が、アシエンからの接触を明らかにしたというのか！
……そうか、奴らは、すでにイシュガルドにまで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00040_ALPHINAUD<tab>We will have new primals to contend with ere long, of that you may be certain. 'Tis but a matter of time. Yet shorn of the support of our missing allies, what can we realistically hope to achieve?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00040_ALPHINAUD蛮神の存在を考えれば、必然ともいえるかもしれないな……。
しかし、蛮神やアシエンと対抗しようにも、
「暁」の仲間たちは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00050_TATARU<tab>Ahhh! In the midst of all the excitement, I completely forgot to tell you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00050_TATARUハッ……！！
裁判のドタバタ騒ぎで、すっかり忘れていたでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00060_TATARU<tab>When I was asking around about the Scions, I heard the most awful rumor!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00060_TATARU仲間といえば、賢人のみなさんの情報を集めているときに、
大変な噂話を仕入れたのでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00070_TATARU<tab>General Raubahn is to be executed for crimes against the sultanate!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00070_TATARU例の酒場で、怪しげな商人さんから聞いたのでっすが、
ウルダハでは、ラウバーン局長の処刑が近いという噂で、
もちきりなんだそうでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00080_ALPHINAUD<tab>If the Flame General dies, we will lose a staunch ally, and the one man capable of holding the sultana's assassins to account.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00080_ALPHINAUDまずいな……
ラウバーン局長が亡き者となれば、
ナナモ女王暗殺の真相も、闇に葬られかねないぞ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lord Haurchefant was wise to counsel restraint, but this business will brook no delay.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00090_ALPHINAUDオルシュファン殿からの助言のとおり、
しっかりとした準備をしてからと思っていたのだが、
これだけは、悠長に構えてはいられないな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00100_ALPHINAUD<tab>We cannot permit this execution to take place. We must save Raubahn!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03001_B00100_ALPHINAUD救いだそう、ラウバーン局長を……。
我々の手で！
